headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Hardest Target
content: Panicked thoughts of a bullseye painted on your back are usually a symptom of paranoia. But in Hardest Target, it’s a grim reality: two teams, each with a marked player rotating every minute, duke it out to kill each other’s Target — and protect their own. There are bonuses for Target-on-Target violence, plus a sweet 2X GTA$ and RP bonus for all takers.
